events.message: We have received your application for the Software Engineer position and appreciate your interest in joining our technology team.
Your application has been categorised under the Engineering cluster based on your experience in software development and system design.
A recruiter has been assigned to your case to guide you through the next steps of our hiring process for the software engineer role.
Your initial screening interview has been successfully completed with positive feedback on your technical knowledge and problem-solving skills.
Thank you for promptly responding to our interview invitation and confirming your availability for the next technical round.
Your technical interview has been scheduled for May 7th at 10:00 AM UTC, focusing on coding challenges and system architecture.
You have successfully completed the technical interview with great performance in coding and system design questions.
An HR interview has been scheduled for May 10th to discuss your career goals and company culture fit.
The HR interview was completed successfully, with positive discussion regarding your expectations and alignment with our values.
We are excited to propose you an offer to join our engineering team with a competitive salary and benefits package.
You have shared positive feedback regarding the offer, mentioning your enthusiasm to contribute to our engineering projects.
We have received your acceptance of the offer, and we look forward to welcoming you onboard as a valued software engineer.
Your onboarding process has started with orientation sessions and initial setup to get you integrated with the engineering team.
The hiring process is now officially closed, and you have been successfully onboarded as part of our engineering workforce.
